title: Love, Kinsey
description: All her life, Kinsey Masters has thought of herself as ordinary, boring almost. She had a normal upbringing, a stable career and a good love life, finally meeting “the One,” Colby.But life has a funny way of turning the tables on you.Faced with a devastating diagnosis, Kinsey sets out to write her last story – her own.Her journey reunites her with each man she’s fallen in love with and with their words, along with other friends and family, she pieces together the story of herself. With each meeting, Kinsey begins to realize that each of her past loves has happened for a reason. And she’s left footprints on their lives just like they did for her.Every life is special, especially your own.
author: Brandy Jeffus Corona
